message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with chia seeds, mixed berries, and a drizzle of maple syrup. 
Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers), cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, and lemon vinaigrette dressing. 
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with quinoa pilaf, steamed asparagus, and a side of mixed greens topped with balsamic glaze.
Snacks: Fresh fruit salad (banana, apple, orange) and a handful of almonds.
Day 2:
Breakfast: Spinach omelette with cherry tomatoes, mushrooms, feta cheese, and whole grain toast. 
Lunch: Lentil soup with mixed greens on the side, served with gluten-free crackers. 
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa pilaf, roasted Brussels sprouts, and a small portion of brown rice.
Snacks: Greek yogurt (unsweetened) with honey and granola or a handful of cashews.
Day 3:
Breakfast: Smoothie bowl made with almond milk, mixed berries, spinach, banana, chia seeds, and topped with coconut flakes. 
Lunch: Turkey wrap with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, avocado, hummus, and gluten-free pita bread. 
Dinner: Stir fry with tofu or tempeh (if dairy is allowed), mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, snap peas), brown rice, and a soy sauce dressing.
Snacks: Fresh fruit salad (banana, apple, orange) and a handful of almonds.
Day 4: 
Breakfast: Overnight oats with chia seeds, mixed berries, and a drizzle of maple syrup. 
Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers), cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, lemon vinaigrette dressing. 
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with quinoa pilaf, steamed asparagus, and a side of mixed greens topped with balsamic glaze.
Snacks: Fresh fruit salad (banana, apple, orange) and a handful of almonds.

Lunch: Lentil soup with mixed greens on the side, served with gluten-free crackers. 
Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa pilaf, roasted Brussels sprouts, and a small portion of brown rice.
Snacks: Greek yogurt (unsweetened) with honey and granola or a handful of cashews.

Lunch: Turkey wrap with lettuce, tomato, cucumber, avocado, hummus, and gluten-free pita bread. 
Dinner: Stir fry with tofu or tempeh (if dairy is allowed), mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, snap peas), brown rice, and a soy sauce dressing.
Snacks: Fresh fruit salad (banana, apple, orange) and a handful of almonds.
Day 7: 
Breakfast: Overnight oats with chia seeds, mixed berries, and a drizzle of maple syrup. 
Lunch: Quinoa salad with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers), cherry tomatoes, cucumber, avocado, lemon vinaigrette dressing. 
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with quinoa pilaf, steamed asparagus, and a side of mixed greens topped with balsamic glaze.
Snacks: Fresh fruit salad (banana, apple, orange) and a handful of almonds.
